objectives_summary: You will have the opportunity to uncover, discover and acknowledge your money anxieties/fears (or any other fears!)- the starting point for healing to occur.
You will have the opportunity to dissolve, diffuse and even remove these money anxieties or fears away - for good.
You will get the the opportunity to respond differently to these money fears (or other fears) and hence create a different reality around your money story.
